Description: Hello,

Weâ€™re running into issues setting up external storage using a container in an Azure Storage Account via SFTP. Despite entering the requested credentials, we continue to receive an "incorrect credentials" error.

Could you help us troubleshoot?

Thank you,
Phil

- the customer is having setting up external storage using a container in an Azure Storage Account via SFTP. Despite entering the requested credentials, they continue to receive an "incorrect credentials" error.

29.04
We had a remote session in which we tested the Azure external storage and provided answers regarding licensing. The customer noticed communication issues for a few computers that don't communicate with the EPP server. They will try a reinstall first, and if this won't work, we'll schedule another remote session to address that.
